items.target: Test source account state validation: Attempt transfer from frozen/closed account, verify system returns 403 Forbidden with clear error and does not process transaction

Test transfer description XSS persistence: Send transfer with script tag in description, then retrieve transaction via /accounts/:id/transactions, verify description is HTML-escaped and script does not execute

Test transfer metadata immutability: Create valid transfer, then attempt to modify transaction metadata (amount, recipient) via follow-up PUT/POST requests using same transaction ID, verify original transaction state is preserved and modifications fail
